body.name: S&A WOODCRAFT Desktop Wood Bookshelf with Wooden Bookend, Bamboo Desk Organizer Shelf and Display Rack with Book Ends, Storage Shelf Bookcase for Office, Home Decor, Kitchen Countertop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 11 mins
features: Keep Your Desk Organized: We combine a desk organizer storage shelf with a wooden bookend to bring you desk shelves that will provide you with a simple way to reduce clutter in your space. Our desk organization shelf is perfect for keeping your favorite books, magazines, cookbooks, binders, documents, CDs, DVDs, video games, etc. neatly in one place

Durable Wooden Build: Our desk organizers and storage book shelves are designed in Canada 🍁 and crafted with close attention to even the smallest details. The desk book organizer is made using quality bamboo wood that offers just the right balance between natural charm and durability to provide long term use

Suitable For Any Space: This desktop display shelf is walnut colored to seamlessly blend in and complement the look of your home, office, living room, and more. The countertop shelf with bookend uses anti-skid pads to keep your furniture safe from scratches making it ideal for tables, desks, counters, shelves, etc.

Spacious And Easy To Assemble: The desk organizers and storage shelves measure 14 x 6 inches to provide you with all the space you need and can be assembled in a matter of minutes. The desk shelf organizer also comes with an Allen key and 2 screws making it ideal for DIY lovers

Thoughtful Gift Idea: Our wood desk organizer is durable and doubles as a piece of home decor making this desktop bookshelf the perfect gift for friends and family. The cookbook and recipe book holder makes for a unique gift for Christmas, Thanksgiving, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Easter, and more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT US : S&A WOODCRAFT is a small family owned business based in Canada, specializing in premium wood accessories. Over the years we have worked tirelessly to find ways to help you re-invent your workplace. We work closely together with manufacturers and engineers to create functional and unique pieces. We also strive to make work a better place by creating well-designed, and durable products that improve our customers' health and productivity. Our goal is to design well thought-out products that will eventually become your individual companions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's what my desk has always needed
reviews.reviewText: As a writer, I'm constantly in and out of books. Sometimes for fun, but often as resources for my creative output. Some books come and go for a short time; others practically live on my desk. The result? Piles of books start to accumulate, taking up space that I desperately need for other tasks.I wanted a shelf that was sturdy, yet simple. Capable of holding several books without imposing over my desk. Elegant without looking gaudy or pretentious.This shelf is exactly what I was looking for. Can't recommend it highly enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute (and useful!) little shelf
reviews.reviewText: The package comes with everything you need to assemble it--even a little screwdriver! Assembly was really easy and only took a couple minutes. The reasons I chose this bookshelf/bookend above others include...(1) With the tilted shape, it is automatically "adjustable." It can hold a single book without it falling over, or it can hold as many books as will physically fit on the shelf. Many adjustable bookend options looked promising, but with the number of times I knew I'd need to take books out to use them, I also knew I'd get tired of adjusting it so things would stay upright. This design makes it easy to take four notebooks out at once without anything sliding or falling.(2) Another advantage of the tilted design is that I can store pens/pencils underneath the shelf at the part where it is raised. And that just helps me keep things tidy.(3) The unit comes with protective stickers so I don't have to worry about the bookshelf scratching the wooden furniture it's sitting on.Because I'm using this shelf for notebooks and books I frequently need access to, I can't stress how handy the utility of its design is, and it looks really nice, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a sturdy little stand for smaller books
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely ingenious idea! It would be great if they were offered in more sizes. The end support is about six inches high and hold average books and journals nicely. Taller, thicker books aren’t really suitable because they slide somewhat and compress the smaller books. If the back support were taller it might give larger books a better chance, but it might tip over since the shelf is short and overall it is lightweight. This little thing can fit anywhere and is much more convenient than stacking. However I do use a weighty knick-knack as a bookend to keep thinner booklets from sliding down. I will look around to see if someone offers additional sizes. The stand is attractive as well, not so bulky as other table top bookstands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks good and serves the intended purpose as a small desktop book shelf, but it should have been super easy to put together but wasn’t because the included screws were terrible—stripped out immediately using the included flimsy Allen wrench. We had to buy better ones at hardware store. Frustrating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this desktop bookshelf and I am thoroughly impressed with it. The nice wood used for the construction is of great quality and the beautiful finish adds a touch of elegance to my workspace. The assembly process was a breeze and it only took me a few minutes to put it together. The shelf is also very sturdy and provides ample space for my books. Overall, I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a durable and stylish desktop bookshelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional, Nice, Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: Simple design and bamboo wood are visually pleasing. There are few parts to assemble. Books cleverly stand up on this slightly slanted bookshelf. Be a little careful when removing a book from a full shelf or a bunch of books may fall off the higher end which has no bookend. It's nice that a mini Phillips screwdriver is included for assembly, but its threads stripped off before the job was done. (That's a pretty common tool many folks will have on hand.) Seems like a reasonable value and I'm happy to have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SCREWS ARE SCREWED
reviews.reviewText: OMG.. The screws... seriously??? The images associated with this product were screws that required a phillips head screw driver to connect the pieces. So as someone else mentioned before.. the hex screws stripped completely within the first few tries.. rendering the item useless. Unable to secure the screws.. I was so pissed I tossed it... I should have returned it and got a refund. There is no doubt this product would be perfect... but really frustrated by the false advertising

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful piece of art. I needed a place to keep some resource books on my desk and they kept falling off with other bookends. This one is functional and really pretty. Beautifully made. Would love to see more items from artist.
